wikipedia_page.main: Robert Christopher Battersby  (14 December 1924 – 30 September 2002)  was British soldier, linguist, diplomat and politician, who served as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the constituency of Humberside between 1979 and 1989. He was a prominent member of the Conservative Party.
